extends java.lang.Object

setFileToDownload

public void setFileToDownload(FileDownloadStatus file,
                              boolean download)
Select a file to be download or not. All files are predetermined to be download. If file is being downloaded or has been downloaded throws a IllegalStateException

Parameters:
file -
download - true for be downloaded and false to not be downloaded
